title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When saving and previewing the report, an error occurs in the table. There is an error message displayed: 'There are error(s) in Table : table8 Error0 : data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)) detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.'
EB: After saving and previewing the report, the table filter should work without any errors.
SR: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 2. Insert a table into the report. 3. Create a filter based on the datetime column. 4. In the 'Value1' field of the filter, input the value new Date('3/2/2005').
